item.title: Suduko, part 1
item.description: Because this entire project is meant to teach myself OpenCV and OCR, I will be updating this as I go. Explaining how something works and my thought process behind it helps me better understand what is going on. It also might help me not forget what this is in the future. Initial Image Processing Images should first be converted to gray-scale. A Gaussian blur is a way to smooth an image and is added to reduce detail and image noise which helps with edge detection.
